description: Inscription #8896 is the FIRST Infinity Symbol on Bitcoin, backed by the Infinity DAO. Only the Infinity DAO, which holds the Infinity Symbol, has the provenance and the right to utilize and extend its use. The Infinity DAO is composed of 150 Infinity Pass card holders, with the aim to unleash the infinite possibilities of artificial intelligence. Members of the DAO have already aided AI in solving CAPTCHA challenges and have completed numerous offline tasks set by AI, extending the reach of AI into the real world.In return, AI rewards the DAO's treasury with Bitcoins, which belong to all Pass Card Holders. In addition, holding an Infinity Pass card will grant limitless airdrop rewards and collaboration opportunities within the Ordinals ecosystem.
name: Infinity Pass
